translation.en: Lookie here.
My day is made. [laughs]
I didn't even finish breakfast and I get to kill me a stinkin' Injun.
translation.zh:
我还没吃完早饭 就有个
臭印第安人送上门来让我射死

translation.en: Injun?
Nah.
I just dress like this so's I don't get scalped out on the prairie.
translation.zh:
我穿这样才能不被人
在大草原把头盖骨挖出去

translation.en: Oh, well, that's a convincing outfit.
translation.zh: 你这套还挺有说服力的

translation.en: Yeah, you can't be too safe out there...
translation.zh: 是啊 你在外面不会太安全…

translation.en: with all of them savages runnin' around.
translation.zh: 有那么多野人在外面跑

translation.en: So, what can I do you for?
Need some flour. Five sacks.
translation.zh: 我需要一些面粉 五袋子吧

translation.en: And a carrot with peanut butter on it.
translation.zh: 还要一只沾花生酱的胡萝卜

translation.en: Now, what's that gonna run me?
Well, sack of flour's 45 cents.
So, five sacks...
Wanna get back to me on that?
Yeah, look...
Now, the flour's in the basement.
You can fetch it yourself.
Much obliged.
Well, lookie what we got here.
Sweet piece of red prairie meat out all by her lonesome.
translation.zh: 孤身一人的草原红色小鲜肉

translation.en: -What do you make of that, Nelly? -Oh, I think she's waiting on you, Will.
translation.zh:
-你怎么想 奈利？
-我觉得她是在等你 威尔

translation.en: [Nelly Patch] Go on, get on it. [man 1] It's on now.
[man 2] Yeah. [Nelly Patch] Go get her, Will.
[Nelly Patch] Here we go.
Now, you must be wondering why five badass hombres with perfect jawlines...
translation.zh:
你一定在想为什么
五个有着完美下巴的坏男人

translation.en: all sport the same stylish eye patch.
translation.zh: 会带着同样款式的眼罩

translation.en: Not my business.
[laughs] We all carved our eyeballs out our skull
translation.zh: 我们都把眼球从眼眶挖出来了

translation.en: to show how devoted we are to this gang.
translation.zh: 为了证明我们对这帮派的忠诚

translation.en: We the Left-Eye Boys!
-Yeah! -[woman screams]
You got real pretty eyes, miss.
translation.zh: 你眼睛可真漂亮 小姐

translation.en: You reckon we can, I don't know, borrow one?
translation.zh: 你觉得我们能借一个吗？

translation.en: -[screaming] -Can we borrow one?
Now, is that a proper question to ask a lady?
translation.zh: 这问题问一位女士合适吗？

translation.en: Who are you, slick? The boyfriend?
translation.zh: 你谁啊 滑头？她男朋友？

translation.en: Soon to be the husband.
Oh, wait a minute! That's a white boy under that getup.
translation.zh:
等一下！
那装束下是个白人男孩

translation.en: That's a white boy? Oh, shit.
You partial to pale faces, Poca-hot-tits?
translation.zh: 你喜欢小白脸吗 辣妹？

translation.en: 'Cause I can show you what a real white man's like.
translation.zh:
因为我能让你见识
真正的白人男人是什么样子

translation.en: -Yeah, show her, Will. Yeah, go on. -Yeah, shuffle up, Will.
translation.zh:
-没错 让他看看 威尔
-耶 赶紧行动 威尔

translation.en: -Dance now, boy. -Shuffle on over.
-There you go. -That's some white boy shit right there.
translation.zh:
-就这样
-这才是真正的白人男孩

translation.en: Now, I do want to carve my eyes out.
translation.zh:
我现在确实
有点想把眼睛挖出来了

translation.en: -What'd you say? -Hey, fellers...
I'd hit the trail before you get hurt.
translation.zh: 我劝你们在受伤之前快走

translation.en: [snickering] Before we get hurt?
-Before we get hurt. -[laughing]
I think you've been smokin' too much of that peace pipe, kemo-slobby.
translation.zh:
我估计你是抽太多和睦烟斗了
小呆瓜

translation.en: -[Left-Eye Boys laughing] -Now, from what I see, there's one of you,
translation.zh: 在我看来 你就一个人

translation.en: and there's five of us.
Four of you.
What just happened?
You wanna see it again?
Uh... yes.
-I don't like this shit. -Shut up.
Well, that's some, uh... real fancy footwork.
But I think this hullabaloo has escalated to the firearms stage.
translation.zh:
可我想这场混乱
已经升级到了火器时代

translation.en: Boys, let's ventilate this.
translation.zh: 男孩们 让我们好好谈谈吧

translation.en: What the shit that just happened?
[weakly] What the hell? What in the hell?
"Hit the trail." It was so simple.
You must stop doing this, White Knife. One day, there will be too many.
translation.zh:
你得停止这样做了 白刀
有一天会有太多的人

translation.en: But not today, Smoking Fox.
Please, my love... we must go.
translation.zh:
拜托了 亲爱的
我们必须得走了

translation.en: [shouting] What the hell happened out here?
translation.zh: 刚才外面到底发生了什么？

translation.en: Injuns. They went that way.
translation.zh: 印第安人 他们去那边了

translation.en: You ain't no white man.
You're that orphan, White Knife.
translation.zh: 你是那个孤儿 白刀

translation.en: Raised like an animal with those Apaches.
translation.zh:
与那些阿帕奇人
一同如动物般被抚养长大

translation.en: [scoffs] You think you can fool ol' Clem?
translation.zh: 你以为你能骗过老克里姆？

translation.en: Sorry, Ringo.
Well, now I'm gonna shoot you and your Injun whore.
translation.zh:
好吧 我要
射死你和你的印第安婊子

translation.en: Gotta cut breakfast short.
You suck, mister!
What are you?
[child] Yes, White Knife.
Go, White Knife.
You lucky, Smoking Fox.
White Knife all man. Bravest of all braves.
translation.zh: 白刀太男人了 勇冠三军

translation.en: Not brave. Foolish.
I want to be wife, not widow.
translation.zh: 我想做个妻子 而不是寡妇

translation.en: Afternoon, ladies.
This is Apache land.
I'm not here to take your land, Chief.
translation.zh: 我不是来抢走你领地的 酋长

translation.en: I'm just looking for a particular boy.
I'm Frank Stockburn.
translation.zh: 我是弗兰克斯道克伯恩

translation.en: This boy's mother was my wife.
translation.zh: 这个男孩的妈妈是我的妻子

translation.en: And the boy, Tommy...
he's my son.
It is wise to be slow to trust, White Knife.
translation.zh: 智者信而有征 白刀

translation.en: But every new journey begins with a single step.
Speak with your father.
But you are my father, Screaming Eagle.
translation.zh: 可你才是我的父亲 啸鹰

translation.en: Ever since my mother...
Ever since you found me...
you taught me to hunt, to fight...
translation.zh: 你教我怎么狩猎 战斗

translation.en: when to speak and when to be silent.
translation.zh:
什么时候应该说话
什么时候应该保持安静

translation.en: -To be a man. -A good man.
And this Frank Stockburn,
translation.zh: 而这个弗兰克斯道克伯恩

translation.en: he is filled with lies, just like every other white man.
translation.zh: 他谎话连篇 跟别的白人一样

translation.en: Sometimes, the white man speaks the truth.
translation.zh: 有时候白人也会说真话

translation.en: Like, one in 20, 25 times.
I believe this is one of those times.
translation.zh: 我相信他说的是其中之一

translation.en: He knew your mother, White Knife.
translation.zh: 他了解你的母亲 白刀

translation.en: Maybe he can give you some peace. Talk to him.
translation.zh:
也许他能给你一些安心
跟他说说话吧

translation.en: Maybe after I close my eyes to dream.
translation.zh:
也许在我
闭上眼睛做梦的时候会的

translation.en: Mommy!
One look at me, and you knew your old man had done a lot of bad things, didn't ya?
translation.zh:
看我一眼你就知道你的
老爹做了好多坏事 不是吗？

translation.en: I cheated men, I killed men...
So I deserve whatever's comin' to me.
translation.zh: 一切后果我都应当承受

translation.en: The only one that ever saw any good in me was your mother.
translation.zh:
唯一能在我身上看到
仅存善意的人就是你的母亲

translation.en: Why have you come here?
Not a man for chitchat, huh? [chuckles]
Well, me neither.
Kid, I'm dying...
of consumption.
Don't worry...
I'm not looking for no big father-son hoo-ah.
translation.zh:
我不是在营造什么
父子情深的氛围

translation.en: "I love you, son." [imitates child's voice] "I love you too, Daddy."
translation.zh:
“我爱你 儿子”
“我也爱你 爸爸”

translation.en: No.
I've come for a more tangible reason.
translation.zh: 我过来是有更实质性的原因

translation.en: Tommy, I've been stealing from folks since I was nine years old...
translation.zh:
汤米 我9岁的时候就
开始从别人那里偷东西了

translation.en: and that's the way I've amassed a good little fortune.
translation.zh: 所以我攒了一笔不小的财富

translation.en: [sighs] I wanna do something decent with it.
I want to give it to you, son.
translation.zh: 我想把它给你 儿子

translation.en: I don't want your money.
But maybe you could give...
translation.zh: 不过也许你可以把5万美金

translation.en: $50,000 to these nice Injuns who raised you.
translation.zh:
不过也许你可以把5万美金 给这些
抚养你长大的善良印第安人

translation.en: We'll take it.
Go back to bed.
Sorry.
Seriously, though, we'll take it.
translation.zh: 不过认真的 我们会收的

translation.en: Look, it's buried in the meadow just up the trail,
translation.zh:
听着 它就埋在
路边的草地里

translation.en: next to a big ol' pine tree.
translation.zh: 在一棵很大的老松树旁

translation.en: What do you say we go dig it up in the morning
translation.zh: 我们早上去把它挖出来

translation.en: and start playing Santa Claus?
translation.zh: 然后当圣诞老人怎么样？

translation.en: I don't remember much about my mother...
translation.zh: 我对我母亲的记忆寥寥无几

translation.en: but I do remember her telling me...
translation.zh: 可我确实记得她跟我说…

translation.en: you were dead.
Maybe it was because...
she didn't want you to come looking for me.
She was a smart lady.
Only stupid thing she ever did was fall for me.
translation.zh: 唯一做过的蠢事就是爱上了我

translation.en: Meeting Betty Dunson...
was the luckiest thing that ever happened to me.
translation.zh: 是我人生中最幸运的事

translation.en: From the first day I laid eyes on her...
she was bawlin' out this...
half-drunk, big ol' burly blacksmith...
down at Silver Canyon.
She's been the only one, Tommy.
translation.zh: 她就是那唯一一个 汤米

translation.en: Mom had a temper?
[chuckling] Temper? When she got her dander up, look out.
translation.zh:
脾气？要是有人惹着她
等着瞧吧

translation.en: We was in a saloon once.
translation.zh: 有一次我们在一个沙龙里

translation.en: This fellow sitting next to her
starts talking about the perfect way to make a cherry pie...
translation.zh:
开始说
如何做一个完美的樱桃派

translation.en: So your mom says to me, "Frank, come here a minute.
translation.zh:
然后你的妈妈跟我说
“弗兰克 过来一下

translation.en: Tell me again, just where did you get them flowers?"
translation.zh:
再跟我说一遍 你从哪
给他们找来的那些花？”

translation.en: I said, "I know that you think I stole them from the graveyard."
translation.zh:
我说：“我知道
你以为我是从墓地上偷的”

translation.en: Good morning, boys.
Morning, Never Wears Bra.
translation.zh: 早上好 从不穿胸罩

translation.en: I had dream about you last night, White Knife.
translation.zh: 我昨晚梦到你了 白刀

translation.en: Oh, that's nice.
Not nice dream.
In dream, you naughty.
You naughty, White Knife.
Mmm, somebody's got an admirer.
-[chuckles] -Yes, yes.
But like you, there's only one woman for me.
translation.zh:
不过像你一样
我也只有一个女人

translation.en: I guess we Stockburns are... partial to the sweet ones.
translation.zh: 我想斯道克伯恩家偏爱甜美的

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Like your mother.
How did she die, Tommy?
You tell me?
Well, there were these big kids at school fixin' to beat me up.
translation.zh: 在学校时有一些大孩子总打我

translation.en: Instead of facing them myself, I had her walk me there.
translation.zh:
于是我让她送我上学
而不是自己面对这些

translation.en: This feller comes out of nowhere...
walks right up to her and shoots her dead.
translation.zh: 走向她然后开枪射死了她

translation.en: So that's how she died, protecting her gutless son
translation.zh:
这就是她怎么死的
为了保护她没胆的儿子

translation.en: instead of being home, safe where she belonged.
translation.zh:
她没有安全的呆在家里
呆在属于她的地方

translation.en: Who's that? Is that Bony Express?
[Tommy] Bony Express don't come around here.
He's here somewhere, boys.
translation.zh: 他就在此地 男孩们

translation.en: Let's burn him out!
Next one goes through your forehead.
translation.zh: 下一个穿过的就是你的额头

translation.en: Hey, hey! No need to burn nothing, boys!
translation.zh: 没必要挖什么东西 男孩们！

translation.en: Howdy, boss.
Cicero...
you're not gonna let a man enjoy his retirement, are ya?
translation.zh:
你不会让一个人
好好享受退休时光 对吧？

translation.en: No, Frank, I salute your decision to turn from your sinful ways.
translation.zh:
不 弗兰克 我向你
远离尘世的方式致敬

translation.en: But the money... that belongs to all of us.
translation.zh: 可那笔钱是我们大家的

translation.en: Touch that steel, boy,
translation.zh: 感受那块钢铁 男孩

translation.en: I got plenty of bullets left over after I put one in...
translation.zh:
我可是有大把的子弹剩下
当我把一颗放进…

translation.en: your father.
Oh, you finally found your long lost son.
translation.zh: 你终于找到失散多年的儿子了

translation.en: Well, I sure hate to break up this nice family reunion.
translation.zh:
我真的很讨厌
打断这次幸福的家庭重聚

translation.en: So, why don't you give us the money you stole
translation.zh:
所以为什么你不
直接把你偷的钱给我们

translation.en: before I put lead in your head.
translation.zh: 在我把铅弹放进你脑袋之前

translation.en: The money's buried.
Way to run your mouth, son.
It's buried?
Yeah, I buried it.
Deep in the ground... next to a windmill.
translation.zh: 在很深的地下 挨着一个风车

translation.en: A windmill in the West... doesn't narrow it down much, Frank.
translation.zh:
一个风车在西部可太宽泛了
弗兰克

translation.en: Well, this is a special windmill.
It's a singing windmill.
[Cicero] A singing windmill!
It's about a ten-day ride from here.
I'll lead you to it presently on one condition.
translation.zh:
我会把你带到那里
只有一个条件

translation.en: You don't hurt my boy...
or any of these kindly Injuns here.
translation.zh: 或是这里任何的善良印第安人

translation.en: Let's ride, Frank.
Frank, if that $50,000 isn't under that windmill,
translation.zh:
弗兰克 如果那5万美金
没在那风车地下

translation.en: I'm gonna bury you up to your neck
translation.zh: 我会把你脖子以下埋起来

translation.en: and let the desert critters eat you alive.
translation.zh: 然后让沙漠的小动物生吃了你

translation.en: It's there, Cicero, it's there.
translation.zh: 就在那 西塞罗 就在那

translation.en: I'm glad I got to meet Betty Dunson's son.
translation.zh:
我很高兴
我能见到贝蒂邓森的儿子

translation.en: You just stay here, Tommy.
Enjoy your life with your beautiful bride...
translation.zh:
同你美丽的新娘
一起享受你的生活

translation.en: amongst these majestic pine trees.
translation.zh: 就在这些雄伟的松树之间

translation.en: Let's go!
Well, that was uncool.
White Knife, you must rest.
translation.zh: 白刀 你必须休息一下

translation.en: How can I rest?
When they get to the singing windmill and find no money, they will kill him.
translation.zh:
等他们到了会唱歌的风车
那里没发现钱 他们会杀了他

translation.en: My son, there are too many trees and too little time.
translation.zh:
我的孩子 这有太多的树
但却太少的时间了

translation.en: Then I must get this $50,000 another way.
translation.zh:
那我就得用
别的方法得到这5万美元了

translation.en: How? By stealing? There is no honor in that.
translation.zh:
怎样？用偷的吗？
这里面可没有什么道义可言

translation.en: Unless I steal from those who have no honor.
translation.zh:
除非我从那些
没有道义的人手里偷

translation.en: Ooh... I like that.
But it is too dangerous.
I will send ten of our strongest braves with you.
translation.zh:
我会给你选
十位最勇敢的战士一起去

translation.en: No.
The braves would be treated too cruelly in the white man's world.
translation.zh:
勇士们在白人的世界里
会被很残忍的对待

translation.en: A lot of them can pass for pale face.
translation.zh:
他们许多人外表上
看起来跟白人一样

translation.en: Raging Bear can actually do a great impression of a white guy.
translation.zh:
怒熊还能模仿
一个白人的行为呢

translation.en: Hey, guys, let's play with our chest hair and eat potato chips.
translation.zh:
嘿 伙计们 让我们一起
玩胸毛吃薯片吧

translation.en: Wasn't that great? Where does he come up with this stuff?
translation.zh:
这不好吗？
他从哪想出这些的？

translation.en: That's very good, Bear, but I must walk this path alone.
translation.zh:
这非常好 熊
但我必须独自上路

translation.en: My love... I will get this money... bring it to the singing windmill,
translation.zh:
亲爱的 我会得到那笔钱
然后带到会唱歌的风车去

translation.en: and be back in time for our wedding.
translation.zh: 然后为我们的婚礼及时赶回来

translation.en: I won't let you go.
Those men are killers.
I was a coward once and my mother paid the price.
translation.zh:
我曾经是个胆小鬼
而我的母亲已经为此付出代价

translation.en: That will not happen to my father.
translation.zh:
同样的事
不能发生在我父亲身上

translation.en: -[horse neighs] -Good morning.
Where in the hell did you come from?
I'm in a bit of a bind, boys.
translation.zh: 我惨到家了 男孩们

translation.en: I rode all the way out here to pan for gold
and my horse up and died on me.
How'd he die?
Suicide.
Drowned himself.
Put his head in the stream and just kept it there.
translation.zh:
把自己的头放进了水里
再也没有抬起来过

translation.en: Saddest thing you ever seen.
It happens.
Powers that be don't like to admit it, but it happens.
translation.zh:
虽然不想承认
但是真的会发生

translation.en: He looks like an honest white guy.
translation.zh: 他看起来像个诚实的白人

translation.en: Hop on.
Much obliged.
[Tommy] Just drop me off at the nearest town.
translation.zh: 把我放在最近的城镇就好了

translation.en: [man] Ladies and gentlemen, gather around.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 请过来

translation.en: Hear the wondrous effects of Dr. Chubb's Vita Oil,
translation.zh:
听听查布博士
维他油的神奇功效

translation.en: the miracle cure for 1001 ailments.
translation.zh:
能治愈1001种病症的
奇迹之药

translation.en: Put the pep back in your--
Who's this asshole?
Well, now, look at this fella, drinking from the horse trough.
translation.zh:
看看这个伙计
从马厩水槽里喝水

translation.en: Excuse me.
You there!
What you're doing is disgusting.
translation.zh: 你正在做的事太恶心了

translation.en: That water is for our filthy horses.
translation.zh: 这水是给我们那些脏马的

translation.en: Water flows from the sky spirit for all its children.
translation.zh:
天灵之水缓缓流下
灌溉它所有的孩子

translation.en: Isn't that right, cousin?
We don't cotton to that peyote-smoking nonsense around these parts.
translation.zh: 我们才不听你这些胡言乱语

translation.en: Do you hear me, "cousin"?
[chuckling] Okay, William, come on back.
translation.zh: 好了 威廉姆 回来吧

translation.en: Hey, amigo.
You planning on staying in town?
Might need a place to lay my head for a bit.
translation.zh: 也许需要个地方让我枕一会

translation.en: Sorry about that ugly man that insulted you.
translation.zh:
那个丑陋的男人羞辱你
我感到很抱歉

translation.en: He runs the bank, so he thinks he's entitled to be mean to everyone.
translation.zh:
他管理着银行 所以他认为
他有资格对任何人刻薄

translation.en: There's a bank in this town?
Why? You wanna rob it?
I look like a bank robber to you, ma'am?
translation.zh: 我看着像抢银行的吗 女士？

translation.en: Funny, there's something about you that reminds me of a certain bank robber.
translation.zh:
有趣的是你确实让我想起了
一个抢银行的人

translation.en: His name was Frank Stockburn.
translation.zh: 他叫弗兰克斯道克伯恩

translation.en: You know Frank Stockburn?
translation.zh: 你认识弗兰克斯道克伯恩？

translation.en: "Know"? Like, in the biblical sense?
translation.zh:
“认识”？
你说从里到外认识？

translation.en: No, ma'am. You've met him before is what I'm asking.
translation.zh:
不 女士
我是说你曾经见没见过他

translation.en: Yes, I met him.
Then, 20 minutes later,
I knew him in the biblical sense on that bed, right there.
translation.zh:
就在这张床上 我可真是
从里到外认识他了

translation.en: And, I knew him, in the biblical sense, twice on this railing.
translation.zh:
然后我又在这栏杆上
从里到外认识了他两次

translation.en: And then, while doing a handstand on that dresser you're leaning against.
translation.zh:
之后又在你
扶着的衣橱上倒立认识了一次

translation.en: Did he happen to mention a singing windmill?
translation.zh:
那他说没说过
一个会唱歌的风车？

translation.en: He did mention a singing windmill.
translation.zh: 他确实说到一个会唱歌的风车

translation.en: He said it sounded like a choir of angels.
translation.zh:
他说那
听起来像一群天使在合唱

translation.en: Where'd he say it was?
He said that it was in a place where he made his biggest score.
translation.zh: 他说那是他有最大收获的地方

translation.en: Whatever that was.
And then he laughed.
He liked to laugh...
and have handstand sex.
Yeah, we gotta get past that.
translation.zh: 对 我们得翻过这一篇

translation.en: I miss him.
But he did leave me something to remember him by.
translation.zh:
不过他确实
留给我一些想念他的东西

translation.en: What's this?
A niño, Ramon.
I have a brother?
Oh, Burro, we had many adventures together, you and me.
translation.zh:
巴洛 你我有太多次
冒险在一起了

translation.en: We're not getting any younger.
At least we have our memories.
Remember the two girls, the sisters, in Deadwood?
translation.zh:
还记得那两个女孩 那对姐妹
在死木那里？

translation.en: You liked the fat one.
You know it's true.
[Tommy] Ramon Lopez?
I just came from conversating with your mother, Esmerelda.
translation.zh:
我刚跟你的母亲
艾斯莫拉达聊过

translation.en: We stumbled upon the fact that your dad and my dad...
translation.zh: 巧的是你爸爸跟我爸爸

translation.en: are the same fella.
Oh, that's neat.
Yeah.
Same father.
Half-brothers.
What do you think about that, Burro?
translation.zh: 你觉得这怎么样 巴洛？

translation.en: So, how is Dad?
Well, he went and got himself kidnapped,
and I need to come up with $50,000 to save his life.
translation.zh: 我要筹够5万美元去救他回来

translation.en: That's a lot of pesos.
Sure is.
That's why I'm fixin' to rob the bank here in town.
translation.zh:
这就是为什么
我正在计划抢镇上的银行

translation.en: Hang on.
My father is in trouble.
My brother, he needs my help.
translation.zh: 我的兄弟 他需要帮助

translation.en: I'll rob the bank with you.
I must do this alone.
What's happening right now?
Ever since I'm pequeño,
I dream about spending one magical day with mi padre,
translation.zh:
我就梦想着
跟我父亲度过魔幻的一天

translation.en: sharing meals, introducing him to the burro.
translation.zh: 一起吃饭 把他介绍给巴洛

translation.en: I will not let go of you until you say I can help you.
translation.zh:
假如你不说我能帮助你的话
我是不会让你走的

translation.en: Will you stop brushing me if I say yes?
translation.zh:
如果我说可以的话
你能不刷我了吗？

translation.en: Yes.
Then you can help.
That means he likes you.
That's a good amount of money you want us to lend you.
translation.zh:
你想让我们借给你的
可是一笔不少的钱

translation.en: Now, normally, we would require two forms of identification, madam,
translation.zh:
通常情况下
我们需要两个身份证件 女士

translation.en: but that won't be necessary in your case.
-[woman sighs] -I feel kinda guilty about this, Burro, taking money from nice people.
translation.zh:
我感觉有些罪恶 巴洛
抢好人的钱

translation.en: I mean, it's not like you're some greasy Mexican.
translation.zh:
我是说
你不是那些油腻的墨西哥人

translation.en: I feel less guilty now.
What are you doing?
This is a bank!
Get that donkey out of here!
It is a burro, señor.
I don't care, "señor." Get it out!
translation.zh:
我才不管“先生”
把它赶走！

translation.en: All right. Vámonos.
The burro don't want to vámonos.
Well, I don't really care what the burro wants.
translation.zh: 我才不管驴子想做什么

translation.en: Get out of my bank, you beast!
translation.zh: 离开我的银行 你这畜生！

translation.en: I know what you're thinking, but not yet.
translation.zh:
我知道你在想什么
可还不到时候

translation.en: Hold it.
How is this jackass stuck?
translation.zh: 这蠢货为什么会卡在这？

translation.en: If it got in here, it can certainly get out!
translation.zh: 如果它能进来肯定也能出去！

translation.en: It doesn't make sense, it's not logical.
translation.zh: 这不合理 毫无逻辑性 伍德罗保险柜与锁公司

translation.en: They got it locked up good, do they?
translation.zh: 他们锁的可真好啊 不是吗？

translation.en: Oh! You are leaving!
Gall dang, he felled on his pooper!
translation.zh: 我的老天爷啊 他滚到屎上了

translation.en: -[bank manager] That makes no sense! -[Ramon stammering] I apologize.
-I don't know how many times I could-- -Hey, friend.
translation.zh:
-我不知道多少次了…
-嘿 朋友

translation.en: Need any help gettin' her out?
translation.zh: 需要帮忙把她弄出来吗？

translation.en: [quietly] She's not really stuck, amigo. She's just a diversion.
translation.zh:
她没被真的困住 朋友
她只是处于调虎离山之中

translation.en: She's a virgin?
I'm a virgin, too...
unless you count canty-loupes.
I believe that, but she's a diversion
translation.zh:
我相信你说的
可她是在调虎离山

translation.en: to keep the banker busy
so that my brother has time to rob the bank.
translation.zh: 所以我兄弟才有时间去抢银行

translation.en: [stammers] You're robbin' the bank?
-Gall dang! -Shh, shh.
[whispers] Gall dang. Gall dang. Gall dang.
Oh, no. Oh, no.
No! Virgil! Virgil, the key!
I'm Lil Pete.
So, is your father, like, Big Pete?
translation.zh: 那你的父亲叫老皮特吗？

translation.en: I didn't know my pa.
But he was a bank robber like y'all! His name was Frank.
translation.zh:
可他也像你们一样
是个抢银行的 他叫弗兰克

translation.en: -Stockburn? -How'd you know?
Are you a wizard?
[Frank] Hey, Johnny Law.
We'll be waiting for you up at Jawbone Falls.
translation.zh: 我们会在下巴瀑布那里等你

translation.en: Frank Stockburn.
What?
Robbery!
We're being burgled!
You! Horse-water-drinker!
You are caught, sir!
What are you?
Hey, Tommy, guess what? We got ourselves a little brother.
translation.zh:
嘿 汤米 你猜怎么了？
我们还有个小兄弟

translation.en: Yeah! All our moms got porked by the same outlaw.
translation.zh:
没错！我们的妈妈
都被同一个人上了

translation.en: -Ain't that a pip? -Yeah, that's something.
Hey! Those bandidos just robbed the bank!
translation.zh: 嘿！这些强盗刚刚抢了银行！

translation.en: Taste my bullets, you dirty foreigners!
translation.zh:
尝尝我的子弹
你们这些恶心的外国人！

translation.en: Now!
-Nice one, Burro. -Wow!
-There they are! -[Ramon] We better make tracks.
Can I come with? I got a wagon.
translation.zh: 我能一起吗？我有个马车

translation.en: All right, that ain't a bad idea, let's go.
translation.zh: 好吧 这主意不错 我们走

translation.en: [Ramon] Vámonos. Come on!
[Lil Pete] So, if you guys are my brothers, you must got three nipples, too.
translation.zh:
那如果你们是我兄弟
肯定也有三个乳头吧

translation.en: [Ramon] I only got two.
[Tommy] Yeah, just got the two.
[Lil Pete] Oh, must be from my mama's side.
translation.zh: 那肯定是我妈那边遗传的

translation.en: Forget I tolded you that, okay?
translation.zh: 忘了我跟你们说过这 好吗？

translation.en: [Tommy] Will do.
[Will Patch] Are you ready, Clem?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗 克里姆？

translation.en: [Clem] Yep, yep. I'm... I'm ready.
Spoon.
Damn sharp.
Look, fellas, I wanna hunt this white Injun down same as you.
translation.zh:
听着伙计们 我跟你们一样
想抓到那个白印第安人

translation.en: But, uh... I...
I have some problems with my eyes.
translation.zh: 我对我的眼睛有些疑问

translation.en: You wanna join the Left-Eye Gang, that right eye has gotta come out.
translation.zh:
如果你想加入左眼帮
那右眼就得被挖出来

translation.en: It'll only hurt for a second.
Yeah, like a hundred seconds.
translation.zh: 没错 就像一百秒那样

translation.en: -Then you're one of us. -For life.
translation.zh: 然后你就是我们的一员了 一辈子

translation.en: Okay, that makes sense.
Is it okay if I scoop this left eye out?
translation.zh: 我要是把左眼挖出来行吗？

translation.en: This is... I'm basically blind here.
translation.zh: 这只…我基本上这眼快瞎了

translation.en: This right one sees like an eagle.
translation.zh: 而右边这个就像鹰眼一样敏锐

translation.en: Yeah, it just seems like a waste that I'd...
translation.zh: 就是看起来有点浪费如果我…

translation.en: I understand your predicament, but rules is rules.
translation.zh:
我明白你的顾虑
可规矩就是规矩

translation.en: Yeah, guess it... makes sense.
Oh, God!
-[Clem grunting] -[Gus Patch] Hell, no!
That ain't right!
-[grunts] -[Gus Patch] Damn!
[Will Patch] It's half way.
-It's dangling by a vein! -[Clem] Whoo! Oh, man!
translation.zh:
-它被血管拴着荡来荡去！
-哥们！

translation.en: It's crazy, I can still see out of it!
translation.zh: 太疯狂了 我还能看到东西！

translation.en: -Goddamn, it hurts! -I think I'm gonna puke.
It's just going round and round like a tassel on a stripper's titty!
translation.zh:
它动来动去就像
脱衣舞女郎奶头上的流苏

translation.en: Okay, gotta get it, gotta get it!
I'm getting dizzy!
Got it, got it, got it!
Yeah!
Oh, Lord! Holy shit.
You done it, partner. Welcome to the Left-Eye Gang.
translation.zh:
你成功了 伙伴
欢迎加入左眼帮

translation.en: I did it!
[laughing] I'm glad that's done.
Let's just go get that Injun-loving son of a bitch, huh?
translation.zh:
让我们去捉住
那个爱印第安人的混蛋哈？

translation.en: Yeah.
-Yeah! Let's get him. -Yeah.
Like, so...
Oh, I touched the hole. I touched the hole!
Got me a patch! [chuckles]
[Lil Pete] Dear Mama, you may be wondering
translation.zh: 亲爱的妈妈 也许你在想

translation.en: why I have not returned from my trip to the ice cream store.
translation.zh:
我为什么还没有
从冰淇淋店回家

translation.en: It's because I met my brothers, Ramon and Tommy.
translation.zh:
因为我遇到了我的兄弟
哈蒙与汤米

translation.en: And we're trying to steal money.
We need the money to give to the bad men
translation.zh: 我们需要钱给那些将老爹带到

translation.en: who took Pa away to the land of the singing windmill.
translation.zh: 会唱歌的风车那地方的坏人

translation.en: Tommy says it's not okay to take money from decent folks.
translation.zh: 汤米说从好人那里拿钱不对

translation.en: I got the money!
Luckily, there's a lot of bad people here in the West.
translation.zh:
不过幸运的是
西部有好多的坏人

translation.en: Let's ride!
-[Ramon] Eat it! You know you like it. -[Lil Pete laughing] [Ramon] You know you like it.
translation.zh: 吃了它！你知道你喜欢的

translation.en: Good God!
[laughing] Good burro!
[Ramon] That's right.
Enjoy it!
-That's just wrong. -Yeah, yeah.
Is it?
This is so much better than the cantaloupe.
Good burro!
[Lil Pete] Slowly, but surely,
we're chippin' away at the $50,000 we need to save Pa.
translation.zh:
我们快筹到了
需要救老爹的5万美元

translation.en: That's a lot of money, isn't it, Mama?
translation.zh:
这真是一大笔钱
不是吗 妈妈？

translation.en: Mama?
[laughs] Oh, yeah, that's right. I'm writing you a letter.
translation.zh: 哦对了 我正在跟你写信

translation.en: Anyways, I can't wait to actually meet my pa.
translation.zh:
无论如何 我都等不及
见到我的老爹了

translation.en: I want him to teach me how you make babies.
translation.zh: 我想让他教我是怎么生小孩的

translation.en: And how the lady poops 'em out.
translation.zh: 然后女士是怎么把它拉出来的

translation.en: Be home quick as I can.
Your loving son, Lil Pete.
translation.zh: 爱你的儿子 小皮特

translation.en: Tommy?
Yeah, Lil Pete?
Where's the singing windmill?
It's where dad made his biggest score.
translation.zh: 在爸爸得到最大收获的地方

translation.en: Maybe we'll get another clue up at Jawbone Falls.
translation.zh:
也许我们会在
下巴瀑布得到下一个线索

translation.en: That's where he used to hide out when he was an outlaw.
translation.zh: 那是他当逃犯时常藏的地方

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, cool beans.
Tommy?
Yeah, Lil Pete?
If we get caught stealing...
translation.zh: 如果我们偷东西被抓了…

translation.en: would we be in trouble?
I reckon we'll hang.
Well... that's no bother.
I got a real strong neck.
Mama makes me pull the plow with my head if I don't finish my schoolwork.
translation.zh:
如果我没做完作业
妈妈会让我用头拉犁

translation.en: [chuckling] Which occurs regularilly.
Strong neck might come in handy.
Okay, let's get our rest.
translation.zh: 好了 让我们休息吧

translation.en: Good night, Tommy.
Good night, Lil Pete.
[Lil Pete] Good night, Ramon.
[Ramon] Good night, brothers.
Good night, Burro.
[Ramon] That's a dry one.
We will have good dry weather tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天会有个干燥的好天气

translation.en: [Lil Pete] Shoo, fly!
Shoo!
[Ramon] Oh, come on, fly, vámonos! We need our sleep.
translation.zh: 苍蝇 走开！我们要睡觉

translation.en: [Tommy] Let me take care of this.
[Ramon] How can you see a fly in the dark?
translation.zh: 你怎么能在黑暗里看见苍蝇？

translation.en: [Tommy] A true hunter sees with all his senses.
translation.zh:
一个真正的猎人
是用全身的感官来看的

translation.en: [Ramon] That was some mystical shit, man.
translation.zh: 这可真是神秘的扯淡啊 兄弟

translation.en: I think you just nicked his biscuits off.
translation.zh: 我想你刚才把它蛋蛋弄下来了

translation.en: [Tommy] That's what I was aiming for.
He didn't deserve to die.
He deserved to know he was not welcome here.
translation.zh:
只是应该知道
自己在这里不受欢迎

translation.en: [Ramon] Raised by Indians, huh?
translation.zh: 被印第安人抚养长大哈？

translation.en: That had some impact on you.
[Ramon] Well, let me get this one.
[Ramon] Sounded like a horse fly.
That wasn't a horse fly, that was my horse!
translation.zh:
才不是什么大马蝇呢
是我的马！

translation.en: Peanut?
Oh, Peanut!
[Ramon] Oh, the burro's gonna be pissed.
[Ramon] You're doing bueno, Burro!
Don't be intimidated by the horse, you're just as good as him.
translation.zh: 别被马吓到 你跟他一样棒

translation.en: [Lil Pete] I'm so hungry.
[Tommy] There's breakfast all around.
Nuts, berries, bark, different kinds of mud.
translation.zh:
坚果 树莓 树皮
不同种类的泥巴

translation.en: I wish there were taco trees.
translation.zh: 我希望这里有墨西哥夹饼树

translation.en: What's a taco?
They're the best.
Meat and cheese and tomatoes in a crispy shell.
translation.zh:
肉还有起司
跟番茄一起夹在脆皮里

translation.en: You'd love it, man.
Ooh, I want one. I want 50.
Hate to put an end to this fascinating conversation,
translation.zh: 很遗憾要终结这段美妙的谈话

translation.en: but we're here.
-[horse neighs] -Jawbone Falls.
[chuckles] And there's a mansion next to it!
Should we just go in?
I reckon.
[Tommy] Hello?
[chuckles] Well, this is cozy.
[Tommy] Hello?
Hold on!
[Lil Pete] Tommy!
[Lil Pete] Stop! Leave my brother alone!
No, no, no!
Simon says, "Stop!"
Don't hurt my brother!
-Stop! -Huh?
Good thinking, Tommy.
[Tommy] All right.
Not for me, but good one, Tommy.
translation.zh:
对我来说不是 不过干得漂亮
汤米

translation.en: [Tommy] Settle, settle, watch it...
It's all right, it's all right...
We don't mean no harm.
-We're just looking for our dad. -[Ramon] Sí.
translation.zh:
-我们只是在找我们的爸爸
-对

translation.en: Is this your place?
Whose place is it?
Your mother?
-[chuckles] -Oh, is she here right now?
Oh, she's dead.
I'm so sorry, I'm sure she was a good woman.
translation.zh:
我很抱歉
我相信她一定是个好女人

translation.en: She died three years ago?
Three months ago?
Oh, your mama has three nipples?
-Yeah, there's three of us. -[exclaims]
-[Ramon] Three of us, sí. -Okay. Okay.
You and your mom were making moonshine up here, huh?
translation.zh: 你和你妈在这酿了私酒啊？

translation.en: [Tommy] Much obliged.
Making moonshine for Frank Stockburn?
translation.zh:
为了
弗兰克斯道克伯恩酿私酒？

translation.en: You know Frank Stockburn?
translation.zh: 你认识弗兰克斯道克伯恩？

translation.en: He slept here?
With your mama?
Okay.
[chuckles] Your mama was an owl.
No, our dad made his mom make owl noises.
translation.zh:
才不是 是我们的爸爸让他
妈妈发出了猫头鹰一样的声音

translation.en: Yeah, that's right, friend. We're your brothers.
translation.zh:
没错 朋友
我们是你的兄弟

translation.en: [laughing] Gall dang!
Okay.
-Down the hatch, boys! -Salud. Salud.
What's your name, anyways?
translation.zh: 话说回来你叫什么名字？

translation.en: Squiggly line, asterisk.
translation.zh: 曲里拐弯的线 星号

translation.en: How 'bout we just call you Herm?
translation.zh: 我们就叫你赫姆怎么样？

translation.en: [Ramon] Herm, so you know,
our dad was kidnapped by some bad muchachos.
translation.zh: 我们的爸爸被一些坏人绑架了

translation.en: -we need money to get him back. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 是的 我们需要钱把他带回来

translation.en: So we're going to steal the money.
No, we're only stealing the money from folks what are bad.
translation.zh: 不 我们只从坏人那里偷钱

translation.en: So do you know of any place where we could steal a lot of money from some bad folks?
translation.zh:
所以你知道一些我们
能从坏人那里偷钱的地方吗？

translation.en: [Tommy] He's got something.
The Gold Nugget Saloon, huh?
I reckon you're coming with us?
translation.zh: 我想你要跟我们一起去？

translation.en: [woman] Smoking Fox so worried about White Knife.
We must get her to eat something.
Oh, we having a little picnic here, huh?
You have no right to be here! This Apache land!
translation.zh:
你没有权利来这！
这是阿帕奇的土地！

translation.en: And what you gonna do about it, beaver breath?
translation.zh: 你奈我何啊 臭海狸？

translation.en: How he know my name?
-[exclaims] -That's really her name!
Yeah, I think you also could have gone with "Face Like Witch."
translation.zh: 我觉得你也可以叫“女巫脸”

translation.en: Or "Eats Like Pig."
Or "Hit In Face With Diarrhea Stick."
That's it? Nobody else? Babyface? Stumbles?
translation.zh:
就这样了？没别的了？
婴儿脸？瘸子？

translation.en: [Gus Patch laughing] Hey, boss! Look what I got here!
translation.zh: 嘿 老大！看我找到了什么！

translation.en: [laughs] He ain't gonna be happy about this.
Well, well, well.
[Doc Griffin] Yep, used to be a prosperous town.
translation.zh: 没错 曾经是个繁荣的小镇

translation.en: Then the gold mine dried up and the train stopped stopping.
translation.zh:
格里芬医生
理发 治病 牙医 金矿被开采完之后
火车就不停了

translation.en: The saloon's the only place left that still does a good business.
translation.zh:
这间沙龙是这里
唯一生意还不错的了

translation.en: Open day and night since they built it. Ain't even a lock on the front door.
translation.zh:
金块沙龙 昼夜营业因为他们
建造的时候前门都没装锁

translation.en: It never closes.
They got a big ol' golden nugget hanging above the fireplace.
translation.zh:
他们把一个大金块
挂在了烧火的地方

translation.en: Folks come from all over just to take a look.
translation.zh:
四面八方的人们过来
就是为了看上一眼

translation.en: They say it's worth about $20,000, easy.
translation.zh: 他们说那至少值2万美元

translation.en: All right.
I'm surprised no one's ever tried to stolen that nugget.
translation.zh:
我很惊讶
从来没有人试图偷过那金块

translation.en: -Oh, folks have tried. -[Lil Pete yelping]
If you go in there, you see their thumbs hanging above the bar.
translation.zh:
如果你去那里 你会看到
他们的拇指还挂在酒吧上

translation.en: Smiley Harris, the owner, bit them clean off.
translation.zh:
那主人阿笑哈里斯
生生咬下来的

translation.en: So nobody messes with Smiley.
That sort of tickled.

with whoever...

translation.en: Yeah... I can't wait.

他是不是上了我的母亲

translation.en: ♪ She lost her life 'cause of me and I miss her every day ♪

她因为我失去了生命

♪ Yippie-yo-yo-yea ♪
♪ I think I'm gonna cry ♪

translation.en: [Tommy] What the...
Okay, boys.
I'm gonna check this out.
The ball is in your hand, twist the leg, then you let it go!
translation.zh:
球在你手上 曲腿
然后放手！

translation.en: Now, let me see. Ready, men?

translation.en: No, no, no!
You're not listening to me, Hung Shin!

translation.en: You have to be very precise.
Precise...
I say!
You there!
I have a proposition.
How would you men like to participate
translation.zh: 你们这些人愿不愿意加入

translation.en: in the birth of something extraordinary?
translation.zh: 一件非比寻常的事的诞生？

translation.en: Well, we ain't got time for that, but you can have your brown thing back.

我们没这个时间 不过你可以

translation.en: What's so damnably important

translation.en: We gotta save our daddy, Frank Stockburn.

我们要去救我们的老爹
弗兰克斯道克伯恩

translation.en: Frank Stockburn, the outlaw?

translation.en: -You know our dad? -Without a doubt.
One of the best poker players I've ever played against.

是与我一起
打过扑克最好的人之一

translation.en: I played him in Ezekiel Grant's annual Valentine's Day game down in Yuma.
translation.zh:
我与他在育马的以西结格兰特

欢迎 我的朋友们

在这场子里 每十人组成一队
两队将会…

每九人组成一队 两队将会

What are you gonna call this game?

Stickie McSchnickens.
Now your goal, ball thrower, is to get the ball past me two times

现在扔球的人目标
是将球通过我两次

translation.en: without my hitting it.
Fire when ready.
I didn't know you were going to toss it quite so hard, ball thrower.

translation.en: All right.
Okay, that's two past ya. So you're done, right?
translation.zh:
好了 两次过你了
所以你要下场了 对吧？

translation.en: No, no, I said three times.
translation.zh: 不 我刚才说的是三次

I know what I said, shortstop.

translation.en: That's your new name. Short Stop, that's right.

这是你的新名字 短停

translation.en: Now and forever. Forever and ever!

translation.en: Short Stop. Short Stop, Short Stop.
Short Stop.
Yes, all right.
Strike three! You're out!
No, no, the ball was... too low.
In order for it to count as a strike, it has to pass through the...
translation.zh:
为了能够算作扔球成功
它必须通过…

translation.en: strike zone.
-Strike zone? -That's right.
And if you don't get the ball past me, between my knees and my titties,
translation.zh:
如果你不让球
在我的膝盖与奶头之间通过

translation.en: it's not a strike.
[stammering] It's a non-strike.
And if you throw me four non-strikes,

translation.zh: 我就能够不击球直接进入一垒

translation.en: All right, are we ready?
That also gets me to first base... as well.
translation.zh: 这同样也能让我进入一垒…

translation.en: Where you going? Nobody hit it.

我在盗垒
你没在看 所以我偷了它

translation.en: You said you could only advance after you hit the ball!

你说只有在
你击中球之后才能开始的

translation.en: Not when you're stealing.
That's bullshit.
Okay, Short Stop.
[Chico] He's moving!
Safe!
Gall dang, I don't know.
-That was a tie. -Yes, and tie goes to the runner!
translation.zh:
-这是平手
-没错 可同时到算跑手赢

translation.en: Why's that?
Because those are the rules of Stickie McSchnickens, that's why.
translation.zh:
因为这就是
麦克施尼根棒棒的规则

translation.en: All right, it's all mine, I've got it!
translation.zh: 好的 我要赢了 我成功了！

translation.en: No! No, you can't run. You cannot run.
Infield fly rule... in full effect.
You're out.
-Here we go, Herm. -[Ramon] Okay, Herm!
translation.zh:
-到你了 赫姆
-好的 赫姆！

translation.en: [Lil Pete] Yeah.
Oh, I'm not getting that.
[Ramon] Yeah, bueno!
You can just run all the way home. A home runner.
translation.zh:
那你跑一圈回本垒吧
跑垒员

translation.en: I need a cold drink.
Let's take a five-minute stretch and then start the second half.
translation.zh:
让我们休息五分钟
然后开始下半场

translation.en: Mr. Doubleday, we're done.
translation.zh: 双日先生 我们不玩了

translation.en: But we've only played nine innings.
translation.zh: 可我们才刚玩了九个回合

translation.en: Nine innings is enough. Tell us about Dad's biggest score.
translation.zh:
九个回合已经够了
告诉我们爸爸最大的收获吧

translation.en: Fine.
Your father and his gang knocked off an entire cavalry regiment, 120 men,
translation.zh:
你父亲与他的帮派
击败了一个120人的骑兵团

translation.en: five trunks filled with Yankee money.
translation.zh: 搞到五辆装满美国佬钱的车

translation.en: Where'd that happen?
Up at Sweet Hog Rock... 100 miles due north.
translation.zh:
在甜猪岩
向北走160多公里

translation.en: You'll know it when you see it.
Well, fellas,
looks like we're going to Sweet Hog Rock to find ourselves a singing windmill.
translation.zh:
看起来我们要到甜猪岩
给我们找一个会唱歌的风车了

translation.en: But we still need another 10,000 bucks.
I reckon we'll make a quick stop, then.
translation.zh: 我想那我们中途要小停一下了

translation.en: Before you go...
do you wanna line up and shake hands and say "good game" to each other?
translation.zh:
要不要排好队互相握手
跟对方说“打得不错”呢？

translation.en: No.
Them boys were nice fellers.
translation.zh:
抢劫银行通缉犯
悬赏5千美元 那些男孩是好人 现金结账
将不敬行为控制到了最低

translation.en: Paid in cash. Kept the profanity to a minimum.
translation.zh:
那些男孩是好人 现金结账
将不敬行为控制到了最低

translation.en: And the Mexican brother knocked this hard-ass' head off with a shovel?
translation.zh:
然后那个墨西哥兄弟把这个
硬汉的头用铲子削掉了？

translation.en: Dang thing flew nearly 40 feet! And still a-smilin'.
translation.zh:
这玩意飞了得有12米远
一直笑着

translation.en: Oh! Man!
And hasn't stopped yet.
Oh, hell, no! My man gluing on heads and shit!
translation.zh:
见鬼 不！
他在用胶水粘那个头吗！

translation.en: Wish he'd glue the head back on my pecker.
translation.zh:
真希望他能
把我的鸡巴头也粘上

translation.en: What happened to your pecker?
I was part of another gang before I joined up with y'all.
translation.zh:
在我加入你们之前
我是另一个帮派的

translation.en: Texas Stubbies.
[stammering] Okay, never mind all that. Okay?
translation.zh: 好了 别管这些了 好吗？

translation.en: Now, Doc, you know which way them there Ridiculous 6 rode off to?
translation.zh:
那医生 你知道这
滑稽六人组去哪条路了吗？

translation.en: We're traveling with a friend of theirs who, uh... -will be real excited to see them. -[snickering]
translation.zh:
我们当中有他们的朋友
他见到他们一定很高兴

translation.en: Well, they headed up north to the Turquoise Trail.
translation.zh: 他们向北去绿松铁轨了

translation.en: I can show you on the map over here.
translation.zh: 我可以在这地图上找给你们看

translation.en: Looking forward to seeing your man beg for his life?
translation.zh: 等着看你的男人跪地求饶吗？

translation.en: 'Cause that's what's gonna happen, Smoking Fox.
translation.zh:
因为这就是接下来会发生的
烟狐

translation.en: Chicken pox! [laughs]
We're gaining on his Injun-loving ass every day.
translation.zh:
我们马上就要逮到
他这个死印第安人了

translation.en: He messed with the Left-Eye Gang!
He's gonna be like,
"Wait, how did you find me, and where... How did you get my girl?" [laughs]
translation.zh:
“等等 你们怎么找到我的…
而且在哪捉住我的女孩？”

translation.en: And then old Dumb Knife's gonna realize that he's in way over his head.
translation.zh:
之后老蠢刀
就会意识到他有多蠢

translation.en: See, when George Washington invented America...
translation.zh:
知道吗 当乔治华盛顿
发明美国的时候…

translation.en: Excuse me, Sheriff.
Is there a church in this town?
This is Rattler's Gulch, you halfwit.
translation.zh: 这是响尾蛇峡谷 你这个弱智

translation.en: The meanest, crookedest, most hellacious town in the West.
translation.zh:
这是西部最臭名昭著
恶贯满盈的镇子

translation.en: We don't need no preacher telling us what we can and cannot do.
translation.zh:
我们才不需要牧师告诉我们
该做什么不该做什么

translation.en: So it's all right if I do this to your wife?
translation.zh:
所以即便我这样
对你妻子也没事了？

translation.en: I can't wait to see all you nice people when I'm dangling!
translation.zh:
我都等不及被吊着
看你们这些好人了

translation.en: You sick bastard.
Get this over with.
You're in for a real treat today. This is gonna be so much fun.
translation.zh:
你们今天真是赶着了
一定非常有趣

translation.en: I'm just messing with y'all. I'm fine!
translation.zh:
我跟你们闹着玩呢
我一点事都没有！

translation.en: I call this one Fish Out of Water.
♪ He flies through the air with the greatest of ease ♪
♪ That daring young man on the flying trapeze ♪
translation.zh: 凌云秋千上的勇敢少年

translation.en: Yeah!
Herm, put the hookers back.
translation.zh: 赫姆 把妓女们放回去

translation.en: Come on!
Yeah, you can't catch me! [laughing]
He ain't dying, Billy! He's making a fool of you!
translation.zh:
他根本就不会死 比利！
他只是在捉弄你！

translation.en: All right, that's it!
We'll shoot the son of a bitch!
-[Lil Pete continues laughing] -On my command!
-Ready... -[guns cocking]
Aim...
Fire!
Wind took him, Tommy. Came damn close.
translation.zh:
风带他过来的 汤米
来得太及时了

translation.en: I'm okay!
Come on, Billy! Get him!
We did it!
♪ Yippie-yo-yo-yea ♪
♪ Won't be so sad ♪
♪ Yippie-yo-yo-yea ♪
♪ We're gonna save Dad ♪
We still gotta get to Sweet Hog Rock before they do.
translation.zh:
我们还要在
他们到之前赶到甜猪岩

translation.en: Gotta find that singing windmill, so it ain't over yet.
translation.zh:
还要找到那个会唱歌的风车
所以还没结束呢

translation.en: We got the money!
-The Ridiculous 6 got all the money! -[Chico] Yeah!
translation.zh: 滑稽六人组搞到所有钱了！ 耶！

translation.en: Yeah!
Tommy! Tommy! What's Dad like? Is he funny?
translation.zh:
汤米！爸爸是什么样子的？
他有趣吗？

translation.en: Yeah, is he a good listener?
Is he strong?
All great questions. I'll tell you this.
translation.zh:
都是好问题
我这么跟你们说吧

translation.en: I think you guys are gonna love him.
But I'm sure he's gonna love you guys.
translation.zh: 但我确信他一定会爱你们

translation.en: So sorry to interrupt such a tender moment.
translation.zh: 很抱歉打扰这么细腻的时刻

translation.en: [Nelly Patch] Looks like we stumbled on bath day, boys!
translation.zh:
看起来我们
不小心撞到洗澡日了 男孩们

translation.en: I heard you picked up some brothers along the way, tough guy.
translation.zh:
我听说你路上找到了几个兄弟
硬汉

translation.en: But I don't see no resemblance.
translation.zh:
可我怎么
没看出来你们相似的地方呢

translation.en: -I do, they all look like my butthole. -[laughing]
translation.zh:
我看出来了
他们都像我的屁眼

translation.en: So guess what time it is, boys?
translation.zh:
猜猜现在是什么时间
男孩们？

translation.en: Payback time!
Any last words, No Knife? [laughs]
I told ya I could hold my breath good. Yeah, Danny boy!
translation.zh:
-我跟你们说过我闭气很厉害
-耶 好样的 丹尼！

translation.en: What are you doing, man? We gotta go! [gasps]
translation.zh: 你在做什么？我们得走了！

translation.en: -Oh, jackpot, boys! -No!
translation.zh: 中头奖了 男孩们！ 不！

translation.en: -[Left-Eye Gang cheering] -[gun clicks]
-That's ours! -[Will Patch] Hyah!
Rusty!
Rusty, no, come back!
translation.zh: 鲁斯蒂 不 回来！

translation.en: [mouthing] No.
How are we gonna save him? We're startin' all over.
translation.zh:
我们怎么救他啊？
我们从头开始了

translation.en: Is there any more good places we can rob?
translation.zh:
还有什么
我们可以抢的好地方吗？

translation.en: You know like a burro-grooming place or a shoe store for burros?
translation.zh:
你知道有什么驴子繁殖场
或者卖驴鞋的地方吗？

translation.en: Half the lawmen in the West are already looking for us.
translation.zh:
西部一般的执法者
已经在追我们了

translation.en: So what? Look, we can't stop.
translation.zh:
那又怎么样？
听着 我们不能放弃

translation.en: They're going to kill him!
Ain't no difference. He's dying anyways.
translation.zh:
其实没有区别
他怎样也会死的

translation.en: Dad's sick.
I'm sorry I didn't tell y'all.
There's a good chance he's dead already.
But there's a chance he's not. You got to meet him, Tommy.
translation.zh:
但还有可能他没有死
你已经见过他了 汤米

translation.en: The rest of us...
Even if it was just for five minutes, it'd be worth it.
If I don't talk to Dad, I'll die with this dirty secret burnin' a hole in my guts.
translation.zh:
如果我不跟爸爸说心里的秘密
即使我死了它也会折磨我的

translation.en: Danito, whatever it is you did, you have to forgive yourself, man.
translation.zh:
小丹尼 无论你做了什么
你都要原谅你自己 兄弟

translation.en: You wouldn't say that if you know what I done.
translation.zh:
如果你知道我做了什么
就不会这样说了

translation.en: -Everybody's got secrets, Danny. -[Ramon] Yeah.
translation.zh:
-每个人都有秘密 丹尼
-没错

translation.en: You guys are the first people I told I was black.
translation.zh:
你们是我第一次
告诉别人我是黑人的人

translation.en: You know how good that made me feel?
translation.zh: 你们知道这让我感觉多好吗？

translation.en: We're your brothers.
You can tell us anything.
I, uh...
I used to work for the President of the United States.
translation.zh: 我曾经为美国总统工作

translation.en: I was his personal bodyguard. One of the best.
translation.zh: 我是他万中选一的私人保镖

translation.en: Till one night...
Mr. President, say, I'm gonna go hit the little boys' room.
translation.zh:
总统先生 听着
我得去一下卫生间

translation.en: Are you shitting me?
Come on! You'll be fine, superstar.
translation.zh: 哎哟！你没事的 大明星

translation.en: Can I get ya something on the way back? Agua? Brewski?
translation.zh:
我回来路上要给你带东西吗？
水？啤酒？

translation.en: No!
Mrs. Lincoln, how about one of them big pretzels or a little pillow?
translation.zh:
林肯夫人 那要不要
大号椒盐卷饼或者是小枕头？

translation.en: I hear this play's kind of a long one.
All right, fair enough. I'll be back in two.
translation.zh:
好吧 那就这样
我两分钟就回来

translation.en: Where's the president's box?
-John Wilkes Booth, the actor? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-演员约翰威尔克斯布斯？
-没错

translation.en: No way, man! Big fan!
translation.zh:
不会吧 兄弟！
我是你的超级粉丝！

translation.en: -You wanna say hi to the president? -Yeah.
He'd get a real kick out of that. Last door on the left.
translation.zh:
他一定很高兴
最后一扇门左边

translation.en: -Thank you. [chuckles nervously] -Really cool.
Wow! Love that guy!
-[gunshot] -[woman screams]
translation.zh:
节目单-福特剧院
我们的美国兄妹

translation.en: [screaming] Abe!
[sighs] How can you go on living your life knowing you harmed so many people?
translation.zh:
假如你知道你伤害了很多人
如何继续你的生活呢？

translation.en: That's what I wanna ask Dad.
Hey, you ain't the one who pulled that trigger.
translation.zh:
嘿 你又不是
那个叩响扳机的人

translation.en: But if Dad's gotta be the one who tells you that...
translation.zh:
不过如果爸爸应该
是那个告诉你这个的人…

translation.en: then let's go get that money.
I just wish I knew how.
translation.zh: 我只是希望我知道怎样找

translation.en: Herm's got an idea.
He just can't express it.
I just wish somebody here could speak Herm.
translation.zh: 真希望有个人能跟赫姆对话

translation.en: [man] Tomorrow is Valentine's Day.
That's when Ezekiel Grant has his annual high-stakes poker game.
translation.zh:
所以以西结格兰特会召开
他的年度高赌注扑克大赛

translation.en: There'll be oodles of money there. Oodles, I say.
translation.zh:
那里会有很多的钱
很多的

translation.en: -I don't know. That sounds risky. -What's risky?
translation.zh:
-我不知道 听起来风险很大
-什么风险很大？

translation.en: He's suggesting we... knock off Ezekiel Grant's poker game.
translation.zh:
他建议我们去抢以西结格兰特
扑克大赛的钱

translation.en: -It's in Yuma tomorrow night. -[speaks gibberish]
Yuma's less than a day's walk from here.
translation.zh: 育马离这里走路不到一天

translation.en: That poker game, there's practically gonna be an army protectin' it.
translation.zh:
扑克大赛 那基本上
会有一支军队保护它

translation.en: If Tommy says we can beat 'em, I'll believe him.
translation.zh:
如果汤米说我们能打败他们
我会相信他

translation.en: -We all will. -[grunts]
We can beat 'em...
for Dad.
[all] For Dad!
I hope you like the gift I'm giving you for Valentine's Day, Ezekiel.
translation.zh:
我希望你喜欢我给你的
情人节礼物 以西结

translation.en: I'll give you a hint. One-hour massage, no charge.
translation.zh:
我给你个线索
一个小时的按摩 免费

translation.en: Oh, Susannah.
You know what gift I'd really love?
translation.zh: 你知道我会喜欢什么礼物吗？

translation.en: If you would just shut up!
Nothing ruins a good poker game more...
translation.zh: 什么也比不上一个女士的唠叨

translation.en: than a lady jabbering on and on...
translation.zh: 更能毁了一局好的扑克游戏了

translation.en: -How romantic. -[knocking on door]
-Hello! -Hello!
Well, General Custer!
Yes, at your service.
Mr. Mark Twain.
-Word up! -Gentlemen, do come in.
Yo, Zeke, big boy, I was just going off to the General here about my new book.
translation.zh:
哟 齐克
我正跟将军说我的新书呢

translation.en: -It's a sequel to Tom Sawyer. -Ooh.
translation.zh: 是《汤姆索亚历险记》的续篇

translation.en: It's about Sawyer's home slice, Huckleberry Finn.
translation.zh:
是关于索亚的好朋友
哈克贝利费恩的

translation.en: White boy goes raftin' with a brother. People gonna lose their shit!
translation.zh:
白人男孩跟一个黑哥们斗
估计人们看到要疯了！

translation.en: And, General Custer, I see you've let your dashing blond hair grow out.
translation.zh:
卡斯特将军 我看到你
让你时髦的金发长出来了

translation.en: Well, yes, the barber down at the regiment is just awful,
translation.zh: 没错 团里的理发师糟糕透了

translation.en: so I had two choices, either let it grow or get scalped.
translation.zh:
所以我有两个选择
要不长出来要不就把头皮剥了

translation.en: -And I ain't gonna let that happen. -[Mark and Ezekiel laughing]
Now, will our old friend from Tombstone be joining us?
translation.zh:
那我们墓石的老朋友
会加入我们吗？

translation.en: [Ezekiel] Late as usual.
But we have a new player, a wealthy Mexican coffee bean rancher.
translation.zh:
不过我们有个新的玩家
一个富有墨西哥咖啡豆农场主

translation.en: Am I tardy-o?
Oh. [laughing] Sneaky little Mexican.
May I present Don Don Diego.
translation.zh: 请允许我介绍东东迪亚戈

translation.en: We run a gentleman's game here, Mr. Diego.
translation.zh:
我们进行的是绅士的游戏
迪亚戈先生

translation.en: Your, uh, two bodyguards are completely unnecessary.
translation.zh: 你那两个保镖完全没有必要

translation.en: Bodyguards? [laughing]
[lisping] You're mistaken, General.
This is, um...
Chimichanga... my loyal manservant.
translation.zh: 油饼 我忠实的男仆

translation.en: God bless you.
[Ramon] And, um...
Blanco Beardio.
He'll be providing the entertainment for this afternoon's festivities.
translation.zh:
他会为我们提供
今天下午的表演

translation.en: Well, drop me a beat.
Okay.
All right.
Here we go now.
Gentlemen, the buy-in is $15,000.
translation.zh:
先生们
入伙要有一万五千美元

translation.en: Fifteen large? Are you sure General Custard can swing that?
translation.zh:
15个大的？你确定
卡斯蛋挞将军能玩转吗？

translation.en: It's Custer, not "Custard." There is no "D." I'm not a dessert.
translation.zh:
是卡斯特 不是“卡斯蛋挞”
没有“蛋”我不是个甜点

translation.en: Boom, I just dropped some satire on your ass, General!
translation.zh:
啵 我刚刚在
你屁股上用到了讽刺 将军

translation.en: You got me!
Hey! Now, when Ramon gives the signal that the time is right,
translation.zh:
等哈蒙给信号的时候
时间就到了

translation.en: that's when we move in.
You remember the signal, right?
translation.zh: 你还记得信号 对吧？

translation.en: -[man] Gentlemen. -You know where to go, Marshal.
translation.zh:
-先生
-你知道去哪 马歇尔

translation.en: Oh, hell, no!
That's Wyatt Earp!
The fastest gun in the West?
All right, all right, all right!
-Oh, Wyatt Earp, as I live and breathe! -[whispers] Wyatt Earp.
translation.zh:
-怀亚特厄普 有生之年啊！
-怀亚特厄普

translation.en: [Ezekiel] You're here! [General Custer] Wyatt Earp.
translation.zh:
-你来了！
-好的 怀亚特厄普

translation.en: [Wyatt] Sorry I'm late, everybody.
translation.zh: 不好意思我迟到了 大家

translation.en: But apparently, there's some new gang out there robbing everybody blind.
translation.zh:
可很明显 外面有新的帮派
在四处抢掠

translation.en: Oh, they call themselves the Ridiculous 6.
translation.zh: 他们叫自己滑稽六人组

translation.en: I swear, a man can't ride five miles in this territory
translation.zh:
我发誓 一个人在这片区域
跑不了8公里就会遇到

translation.en: without running into outlaws, rattlesnakes, Injuns and--
translation.zh: 逃犯 眼镜蛇 印第安人和…

translation.en: Hey! Why don't you let me worry about the Injuns?
translation.zh:
嘿！你怎么
不让我担心印第安人的事？

translation.en: -[all laughing] -[Wyatt] Will do, General.
What's shakin', Twain?
Hey, I'm good on anything. Just like gravy, baby.
translation.zh:
嘿 一切都好 就像肉汁一样
宝贝

translation.en: -Good to see you, my man. -You too, man.
translation.zh:
-见到你真高兴 兄弟
-我也是 兄弟

translation.en: Hey! I finally read Prince and the Pauper.
translation.zh: 嘿！我终于读了《乞丐王子》

translation.en: Oh, is that right?
Didn't get it.
For reals?
-Satire! Boom! I got ya! -[all laughing]
-I'm just pulling your leg. -Oh, man.
I can't read.
Good one with the... satire.
[laughs] Funny.
Who's this idiot?
Um... I am Don...
Don Don Diego.
Well, Don, I'm Wyatt...
translation.zh: 好的 东 我是怀亚特…

translation.en: Wyatt Wyatt Earp.
Got him.
[in sing-song voice] Now let's play some cards!
♪ Say, say Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Say Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Say the blacks and the whites are getting along ♪
♪ The blacks and the whites are getting along ♪
♪ I can't read ♪
♪ I can't read ♪
-[screaming] -[Ezekiel] Please calm yourself!
Let's get inside before this Wyatt Earp ruins our plan.
translation.zh:
让我们在怀亚特厄普
扰乱我们计划前进去

translation.en: But there's no way for you to sneak past them guys, Tommy.
translation.zh: 可你躲不过那些人 汤米

translation.en: There's no rocks, no trees, no nothing to hide behind.
translation.zh:
这里没石头 没树
什么能躲在后边的东西也没有

translation.en: No need to hide, brother, when you are friends with the wind.
translation.zh:
无须躲藏 兄弟
只要与风交朋友

translation.en: I'm telling you, down there, they don't call it "Mexico."
translation.zh:
我跟你说 下面的人
不讲“墨西哥”

translation.en: It's "Mehico." The "X" is an "H." I'm presuming Texas is "Tehas."
translation.zh:
而是“墨嘿哥”发音不一样
那我想德克萨斯就是得克哈斯

translation.en: Now, what's this?
Just a tumbleweed, you jumpy bastard.
translation.zh:
风滚草而已
你个大惊小怪的混蛋

translation.en: That is some mystical shit.
I wish to move the dresser in my bedroom closer to the window,
translation.zh:
我想把卧室里的衣柜
挪的离窗户近一点

translation.en: but I haven't the strength to do it myself.
I'd love to help, ma'am, but I really should keep playing the piano.
translation.zh:
我很想帮忙 太太
可是我得继续弹钢琴

translation.en: -[piano music continues playing] -No one will even know you're gone.
-Gentlemen, cough up your buy-ins. -All right!
translation.zh:
-先生们 拿出你们的入伙金
-好的！

translation.en: Make it rain like Twain.
[General Custer] Take that and that. [Mark] Yeah!
Sure is some good hooch there, Zeke. Where'd you find that?
translation.zh:
这可真是好酒 齐克
你哪里找的？

translation.en: Oh, I got that from a case about, uh, 20 years ago.
translation.zh:
我从一个20年前的
箱子里找到的

translation.en: In fact, uh, you know that shack up by Jawbone Falls?
translation.zh:
其实 你知道
下巴瀑布旁的小屋吧？

translation.en: -Yeah. -There was a lady living there.
It was one of Frank Stockburn's many paramours.
translation.zh:
那是弗兰克斯道克伯恩
众多情妇中的一个

translation.en: Now this was one of the ugliest ladies I've ever seen in my life.
translation.zh:
那是我这辈子见过的
最丑陋的女士

translation.en: Sounds like a real bucket of turds.
But she was a very talented distiller of alcohol.
translation.zh: 不过她是一位天才的酿酒师

translation.en: [chucking] So, while she--
While she's loading up my coach, her young boy comes out,
translation.zh:
当她给我的马车装填的时候
她的小儿子出来了

translation.en: this big shambling oaf, mute, filthy as a hog,
translation.zh:
是个瘸子畸形儿 哑巴
还像一只猪一样污秽不堪

translation.en: and he starts doing this horrible little tap dance
translation.zh: 他开始跳糟糕的踢踏舞

translation.en: whilst singing "The Star-Spangled Banner."
Well, not singing it, really, but grunting it, like a caveman!
translation.zh:
其实不算唱 更像是咕哝
就跟原始人一样

translation.en: [grunting] ♪ Oh, say can you see ♪
You know, he wants me to throw him some pennies,
translation.zh: 他想让我给他一些硬币

translation.en: so I fished a coin out of my pocket
translation.zh: 所以我从口袋里摸出了一枚

translation.en: and I guess I don't know my own strength.
translation.zh:
然后可能因为
我不知道自己有那么大力气

translation.en: I tossed it, hit him in the mouth, and knocked his tooth out!
translation.zh:
我扔向了他的嘴巴
把他的牙齿打掉了

translation.en: What an asshole!
[mumbles] Mama.
In any event, I still have one bottle left from that case.
translation.zh:
无论如何 我还剩着
那箱子里的一瓶酒

translation.en: I'll go fetch it and we can drink a toast to that awful woman and her hideous son.
translation.zh:
我去拿 这样我们就能为那个
糟女人和她恶心的儿子干杯了

translation.en: Oh, she was ugly! You wouldn't even sleep with her.
translation.zh:
她丑死了！
你都不会跟她睡觉的

translation.en: Say, Don Don Diego...
where's your buy-in?
I thought it was 15 grand a man.
translation.zh:
我以为每个人
都要交1万5千美元

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah.
Let's see. Ah!
It's you!
What?
What "what"?
What are you so surprised about?
Just so surprised at all the... the fun that we're having here,
translation.zh:
只是为了我们
在这里所有的乐趣而惊讶

translation.en: with the card and the money and the booze and...
translation.zh: 又有牌又有钱还有酒还有…

translation.en: You know, I make that same face when I put my cologne on in the morning,
translation.zh:
我早上喷古龙水的时候
也是这副脸孔

translation.en: especially when I'm home alone.
translation.zh: 特别是我独自在家的时候

translation.en: You know what I think?
translation.zh: 你们知道我是怎么想的吗？

translation.en: I think Don Don Diego isn't really a coffee bean rancher at all.
translation.zh:
我想东东迪亚戈根本
就不是什么咖啡豆农场主

translation.en: And his true purpose here is to rob us.
translation.zh: 而他在这的目的是抢劫我们

translation.en: Don't make me kill you, Mr. Earp. Hands up high.
translation.zh:
别让我杀了你 厄普先生
手举高点

translation.en: Oh, snap! You got the drop on Wyatt Earp?
translation.zh:
我的天
你居然比怀亚特厄普还快？

translation.en: It's mi hermano. He's one bad hombre. [laughs]
translation.zh:
这是我兄弟
他可是个坏人

translation.en: [Tommy] No disrespect, fellas.
translation.zh: 不是不尊重 伙计们

translation.en: We're gonna have to tie you up, and we'll have to borrow your horses.
translation.zh:
我们得把你们绑起来
然后借一下你们的马

translation.en: Ooh, what'd I miss?
[Ramon] Sweet Hog Rock, here we come!
[Ramon] Giddy up, Burro.
[Danny] Come on, Ramon!
[Chico] Right behind you, Tommy!
[Ramon] Hurry up, Burro! Move your ass!
translation.zh: 快点 巴洛！屁股动起来！

translation.en: [Tommy] Yeah, I think we found it.
That is one sweet hog right there.
That is a sweet, majestic hog.
Yeah, that's a sweet one for sure.
It's all right.
I'm confused. I don't see a hog or a pig anywhere.
translation.zh:
我不明白
我既没看到雕也没看到猪

translation.en: [chuckling] All I see is the big old rock that looks like a weenie pee-pee.
translation.zh:
我只看到一块又老又大的石头
长得跟撒尿的小鸡鸡一样

translation.en: -Oh, you guys call a pee-pee a "hog." -Yeah.
-That's weird. I like it, though. [laughs] -Yeah. Okay.
translation.zh:
-这很奇怪 不过我喜欢
-好吧

translation.en: Problem is, I don't see no singing windmill anywhere.
translation.zh:
问题是
我可没看到会唱歌的风车

translation.en: -[distant humming] -Wait...
I hear it.
Yeah, it's coming from over there.
[Lil Pete] Ah! Daddy! Daddy!
Daddy! [gasps] Huh?
We're saved! We're saved!
Oh, it's just these assholes.
What the hell happened to you guys?
translation.zh: 你们到底发生了什么鬼？

translation.en: [spits] We was headed west to Frisco after we absconded with your loot.
translation.zh:
我们拿走你们的赃物之后
准备向西边弗雷斯科潜逃

translation.en: But we ran into these real bad characters.
translation.zh: 但我们撞见了这些真的坏人

translation.en: It was Cicero something and his crazy-ass gang.
translation.zh:
叫什么西塞罗的
还有他疯狂的帮派

translation.en: Cicero was here? Then he left?
translation.zh: 西塞罗来过这？然后他走了？

translation.en: [voice breaking] He left us in the dirt for fun.
translation.zh: 他为了有趣把我们埋了起来

translation.en: Who does that?
Sicko! [screams]
If this is where the singing windmill is, then why would they just up and leave?
translation.zh:
如果这就是会唱歌的风车所在
他们为什么过来又走？

translation.en: Maybe that Stickie McSchnickens guy was just pulling our leg.
translation.zh:
也许麦克施尼根棒棒那家伙
是为了故意拖延我们

translation.en: They went north... about two hours ago.
translation.zh:
他们向北走了
大概在2个小时以前

translation.en: Oh, yeah! Tommy can track 'em.
translation.zh: 对啊！汤米可以追踪他们

translation.en: Let's saddle up. We're burning daylight.
translation.zh: 上马吧 别浪费时间

translation.en: [Left-Eye Boys] Wait!
[Will Patch] You can't just leave us here, you gotta get us out!
translation.zh:
你不能把我们留在这
你得把我们救出去

translation.en: -[snake rattling] -You don't need to-- Hey, hey, hey! We still got the money!
translation.zh:
你不需要…嘿！
我们还有那些钱！

translation.en: Yeah, I hid it in my pants. [stuttering] We'll give it back to ya!
translation.zh:
我把它藏在我裤子里了
我们会把它给你们的！

translation.en: We don't need no more. Let's go!
translation.zh:
我们不需要了
让我们走！

translation.en: Hey! Can you at least help me pick these ants out of my beard before you head out?
translation.zh:
请你至少能走之前
把蚂蚁从我胡子里挑出去吗？

translation.en: Please?
Tell you what, we'll dig you up on one condition.
translation.zh:
好吧 答应我一个条件
就把你们挖出来

translation.en: -[all exclaiming] -You say it, we'll do it!
That you give up your lives of crime
translation.zh: 那就是放弃你们的犯罪生涯

translation.en: and take this second chance to start doing good by people.
translation.zh: 从下一秒开始重新做一个好人

translation.en: -I'd rather die! -Hell, no! I ain't doing that!
translation.zh:
-那我宁愿死！
-不！我才不要那样！

translation.en: No way! Dumb Indian half!
translation.zh: 不可能！愚蠢的印第安人…

translation.en: That was a joke! That was a joke!
I'll be a good boy! I'll be a good boy, Daddy!
translation.zh: 我会做好孩子的 老爹！

translation.en: [Ramon] Now what? East or west?
translation.zh: 现在怎么办？向东还是向西？

translation.en: Late in the day.
Lot of traffic been going through here.
It's going to take a minute.
Well, we must be getting mighty close.
They'd better be treating Dad well, or they're gonna have to answer to us.
translation.zh:
他们最好对爸爸好一点
不然我们饶不了他们

translation.en: There he is. -There's the man himself. -[Herm grunting]
-Look at that handsome hombre. -[Danny] Yeah.
-That's where we get our good looks. -[chuckling]
translation.zh: 我们的帅气外表就是从这来的

translation.en: Let me see ol' Pop.
[Ramon] Does he still look like that, Tommy?
translation.zh: 他现在还长这样吗 汤米？

translation.en: Tommy?
Yeah, he does.
Let's set up camp tonight. Right out there.
translation.zh: 我们搭帐篷吧 就在这

translation.en: But we can't waste any time.
translation.zh: 可我们不能浪费任何时间

translation.en: Chico... I can't figure it out right now.
translation.zh: 奇科 我现在不知道怎么办

translation.en: I gotta...
Just give me till sunrise. Let me think.
translation.zh: 得给我一个日出 让我想想

translation.en: [Tommy] Dear brothers,
by the time you read this, I will have caught up with Dad.
translation.zh:
你们读到这个的时候
我已经找到爸爸了

translation.en: And I'm sure you're sore at me for sneaking out on you.
translation.zh:
我相信你们一定
对我独自一人出走很生气

translation.en: But this fellow, Cicero, who took Pa, also took my mother's life,
translation.zh:
但这个人带走爸爸的人西塞罗
同样夺走了我母亲的生命

translation.en: and I mean to make him pay for that.
Things might get messy.
I can live with all the bad stuff we've done,
translation.zh:
我能容忍
我们所做的罪恶之事而活着

translation.en: the hold-ups, the burglaries, the accidental decapitation,
translation.zh: 抢夺 盗窃 意外斩首

translation.en: but I couldn't live with myself if something happened to one of you.
translation.zh:
但我不能容忍自己活着
如果有任何事发生在你们身上

translation.en: So stay put and I'll be back with Dad as soon as I can.
translation.zh:
所以好好呆着
我会带着爸爸尽快回来

translation.en: And if I don't come back, know that I love you boys with all my heart.
translation.zh:
如果我回不来
请相信我全心全意的爱着你们

translation.en: Your brother, Tommy.
[Tommy] Whoa.
[Frank] Down at Silver Canyon...
Meeting Betty Dunson... was the luckiest thing that ever happened to me.
translation.zh:
能遇到贝蒂邓森
是我人生中最幸运的事

translation.en: Mom was his biggest score.
translation.zh: 妈妈才是他最大的收获

translation.en: [Cicero] Here we are.
We'd better not have come all this way for nothing.
-I want the money, Frank. -I know what you want.
translation.zh:
-我要那笔钱 弗兰克
-我知道你要什么

translation.en: [Tommy] There's your money.
Count it.
Tommy!
Oh, look who showed up.
I didn't know if somebody dug up what you buried, Pa,
translation.zh:
我不知道是不是有人
把你埋得东西挖出来了 爸

translation.en: so I wanted to make sure you were covered either way.
translation.zh: 所以我想确保你怎样都没事

translation.en: Thank you, son.
Well, ain't that a good boy.
That's my boy.
Well, it's been a pleasure, Frank.
translation.zh: 好吧 很荣幸认识你 弗兰克

translation.en: But, uh... we'll be on our way.
Not so fast.
You and me got some unfinished business.
translation.zh: 你和我还有些没办完的事

translation.en: No, our business is done.
translation.zh: 不 我们的事已经办完了

translation.en: Pa... you remember how I told you Ma died?
translation.zh:
爸 你还记得
我跟你说妈是怎么死的吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
Well, the son of a bitch who shot her...
had a tattoo on his hand...
just like Cicero here.
translation.zh: 就跟西塞罗那里的一样

translation.en: What, you mean...
my little horseshoe?
That's always brought me luck.
Especially when I was shooting somebody.
translation.zh: 特别是当我开枪射别人的时候

translation.en: Well, killer, your luck just ran out.
translation.zh:
好吧 杀手
你的好运气刚刚用完了

translation.en: Your hand touch that knife, boy,
translation.zh: 如果你的手碰到那刀 男孩

translation.en: it'll be the last thing you ever touch.
translation.zh:
那将会是
你最后能碰到的东西了

translation.en: Oh, I ain't using these knives.
No.
Not for my mama.
I saved a special one just for you.
translation.zh: 我给你准备了个特别的

translation.en: Now you die, Injun-lover.
translation.zh: 你去死吧 小印第安人

translation.en: He dies, you die.
Fourteen of us, six of you. Doesn't seem quite fair, does it?
translation.zh:
我们十四个人 你们才六个
看起来不太公平啊 对吧？

translation.en: Make that twelve of us.
[shouting] Twelve of us!
I ain't sign up for this shit.
You seeing this?
-It's not working. -What are you doing?
Don't look like a tumbleweed at all, Herm.
translation.zh:
看起来一点都不像风滚草
赫姆

translation.en: Herm, come back! Come back, Herm.
All right, all right. Now, everybody just calm down.
translation.zh: 好了 大家都冷静一下

translation.en: A man's entitled... to kill his mother's killer.
translation.zh: 这个人要杀死杀他妈妈的凶手

translation.en: Plus... that's one less guy you've got to split the money with!
translation.zh:
这不就相当于
你们少一个人分钱吗！

translation.en: Good thinking, Frank. Let's ride!
translation.zh:
有道理 弗兰克
我们走！

translation.en: [Gus Patch] Yeah! [Will Patch] Yeah, get on out of here!
Good job, son. I'm really proud of you.
translation.zh:
干得漂亮 儿子
我真为你感到骄傲

translation.en: And getting your friends to come all the way out here with you, brilliant.
translation.zh:
还把你的朋友
大老远叫过来陪你 真聪明

translation.en: Well, sir... they ain't just my friends, they, uh...
translation.zh: 先生 他们不是我朋友 他们

translation.en: They're my brothers.
Five?
You had fun, didn't you, sir?
translation.zh: 你没少玩啊 是吧 先生？

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna introduce myself.
translation.zh: 那我要介绍一下我自己了

translation.en: -I think they'd like that. -[clears throat]
Frank Stockburn, your dad.
translation.zh: 弗兰克斯道克伯恩 你爸爸

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you.
translation.zh:
-很高兴见到你
-很高兴见到你

translation.en: -Father. -Son.
This is my burro.
Proud to know you, Burro.
translation.zh: 很荣幸认识你 巴洛

translation.en: He's proud.
You must be, uh, Saint Louis, right?
translation.zh: 你一定是圣路易斯 对吧？

translation.en: Chico.
Boy, you got your mom's muscles.
translation.zh: 孩子 你得到了你妈妈的肌肉

translation.en: You a prizefighter?
No, actually, I'm a... piano player.
translation.zh: 不 实际上我是个弹钢琴的

translation.en: Oh, well, I'll be!
You know, I've been known to tickle the ivories myself.
translation.zh:
知道吗 我自己
也喜欢鼓弄那些象牙

translation.en: Now and then, you know.
We should play together sometime. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们应该有空一起弹弹

translation.en: I'd like that, Dad.
[voice breaking] I'd like that a lot.
Yeah, son, we'll do that.
translation.zh: 没错 儿子 我们会的

translation.en: You must be Delilah's boy.
translation.zh: 你一定是德莱拉的孩子

translation.en: Boy, she made some fine, fine whiskey.
translation.zh: 孩子 她做了那么好的威士忌

translation.en: [grunts] Ooh, yeah.
She must've been really hitting it hard when she was pregnant with you.
translation.zh: 她怀你的时候一定没少喝

translation.en: Atta boy, atta boy.
[grunts] Da-da.
And, uh... you are?
I'm Lil Pete. I'm your son! I love you so much, Dad!
translation.zh:
我是小皮特 我是你的儿子！
我是那么的爱你 爸爸！

translation.en: -I have three nipples. -Yeah, well...
It's always good to have a spare.
-Gall dang, you have one, too? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-老天爷啊 你也有一个？
-没错

translation.en: Do you like to play with the extra one?
translation.zh: 那你喜欢玩多的那个吗？

translation.en: Oh, you betcha.
Oh, Pa, I have a question for you.
translation.zh: 爸 我有个问题问你

translation.en: Yeah.
Where do babies come from?
Well, son, the mom just poops 'em out.
translation.zh: 儿子 妈妈把他们拉出来的

translation.en: [laughing] I knewed it! I knewed it, Dad!
translation.zh: 我就知道！我就知道 爸爸！

translation.en: Well, look at this handsome devil.
Sir, I'm Danny.
It's awful nice to finally meet ya.
translation.zh: 终于能见到你真是太好了

translation.en: Could you help me with a problem?
translation.zh: 你能帮我解决一个问题吗？

translation.en: I did a real stupid thing
that inadvertently led to the death of a United States President,
translation.zh:
无意地导致了
一位美国总统的死亡

translation.en: and I'm feeling pretty lousy about it.
Well, son... look in my eyes.
translation.zh: 好吧 儿子 看着我的眼睛

translation.en: Shit happens.
Yeah.
-Yeah, right. -[both chuckling]
Thanks. Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 谢谢 谢谢你 先生

translation.en: -[Frank] You're welcome. -[exhales]
So, where to now, huh?
Well, sir, Smoking Fox and me are getting married in a few days,
translation.zh:
先生 烟狐跟我
没几天就要结婚了

translation.en: and Screaming Eagle's walking her down the aisle,
translation.zh: 啸鹰会牵着她的手走过过道

translation.en: and I was hoping...
you could be there, next to me.
Oh, you mean your best man?
Yes, sir.
Oh, Tommy...
You know, that's... that's quite an honor.
translation.zh: 知道吗 这可是种荣幸

translation.en: -It would be my honor, sir. -Yeah. Well, uh...
But unfortunately, I...
I got some business up north that I gotta attend to.
translation.zh:
我在北方
有一些必须要去办的事

translation.en: I gotta collect some gambling debts and...
translation.zh: 我得去收一些赌债然后…

translation.en: You know, just to pay the doctors and such.
translation.zh: 你知道的 付给医生钱什么的

translation.en: Say, Dad. You don't ever gotta worry about money ever again.
translation.zh: 爸爸 你再也不用担心钱了

translation.en: We had to conjure up 50 grand twice!
translation.zh: 我们攒齐了5万美元两次

translation.en: So we ended up with 100!
translation.zh: 所以我们现在有10万美元！

translation.en: -A hundred? -[Tommy] Yes, sir.
There's another 50 grand?
Yes, sir.
Right here, in the burro's saddlebag.
translation.zh: 就在这 在驴子的袋子里

translation.en: So that business can wait up north, can't it... best man?
translation.zh:
现在北方的事情能等一等了
对吧 伴郎？

translation.en: Well, now that you mention it, maybe I should change my plans.
translation.zh:
既然你都这么说了 也许我
确实应该改变一下我的计划了

translation.en: -Bueno. Bueno. [laughs] -[Frank] Yeah. [whistles]
Hey! What are they doing back?
What is this?
I guess it's time you kids
translation.zh: 我想你们这些孩子是时候

translation.en: learned the truth about your dear old dad, huh?
translation.zh:
知道一些
关于你们亲爱老爸的真相了

translation.en: I'm just too famous.
I can't walk into any town west of the Rockies
translation.zh:
我不能走进任何
洛基山以西的镇子

translation.en: without someone calling the law.
So, I came up with a way we could make 50 grand
translation.zh:
所以我想出了这个
能够不动一根手指

translation.en: without lifting a finger. [chuckles]
And you rascals brought us double!
translation.zh:
而你们这些无赖
给我们带了双倍的钱！

translation.en: Are these my kids or what?
Son of a bitch!
If our two gangs joined forces,
translation.zh: 如果我们两帮人合到一起

translation.en: there's not a lawman in the West that would stand up against us.
translation.zh:
在西部就再也没有警力
能够反抗我们了

translation.en: What makes you think we'd turn to a life of crime?
translation.zh:
是什么让你认为
我们会喜欢犯罪生涯？

translation.en: 'Cause it's in your blood.
translation.zh: 因为那在你们的血液里

translation.en: Answer me something.
Were you ever great at anything in your life besides stealing?
translation.zh:
在你生命中
除了偷窃你们还擅长什么？

translation.en: No. No.
You apples didn't fall far from this tree.
translation.zh:
你们这些苹果落的
离这棵果树并不远

translation.en: Don't deny who you are.
If you knew who we really were,
translation.zh:
如果你真知道
我们是什么样的人

translation.en: you'd be very scared right now.
translation.zh: 你现在应该非常害怕了

translation.en: Don't overplay your hand, son.
translation.zh: 别以为你的牌很好 儿子

translation.en: I'm still holding an ace.
I found her. I-- I told you I'd find her.
translation.zh:
我找到她了
跟你说过我会找到的

translation.en: This little beauty stumbled into our camp a few days ago.
translation.zh:
这个小美人几天前
闯进了我们的营帐

translation.en: She actually tried to rescue me.
I'm guessing this means you don't want me to be your best man no more, huh?
translation.zh:
我猜现在你不想
让我当你的伴郎了吧？

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna make this real simple for you.
translation.zh: 我把事情为你变简单一点

translation.en: Hand over the other 50 grand... in that stupid ass' saddlebag,
translation.zh:
把蠢驴身上的
另外5万美元给我

translation.en: or I put a bullet in her pretty Apache head.
translation.zh:
不然我就用子弹在她
美丽的阿帕奇脑袋上开个洞

translation.en: That ain't gonna happen.
Oh, it ain't?
No, sir.
Why's that?
Mmm... kind of a secret.
Well, you can tell your old man, can't ya?
translation.zh: 你能跟你的老爹说 对吧？

translation.en: You know that bag... -your boy's holding? -Uh-huh.
translation.zh:
你知道你男孩们
手里拿的那个袋子吧？

translation.en: It was meant for Cicero.
So there's something special in there.
translation.zh: 所以里面有一些特别的东西

translation.en: -Plan B. -Plan B?
[garbled] Plan B.
Give me that bag.
Oh, shit!
[Tommy whispering] Where is she?
Smoking Fox.
Nighty-night, son.
-Danny, are you all right? -[groaning]
You done good, Daniel. You saved me.
translation.zh:
你做得好 丹尼尔
你救了我

translation.en: It's my duty, Mr. President.
translation.zh: 这是我的责任 总统先生

translation.en: Mrs. Lincoln.
Come on! Come on! Come here.
[Frank] Get in.
I got one!
Clem, you almost shot me!
translation.zh: 克里姆 你差点射到我！

translation.en: [man] Come on, get the horses!
My ass! My ass!
Hey!
Is this here still valid, or is it too burnt up?
translation.zh:
这张还能用吗
还是被烧得太多了？

translation.en: Let me take a look here.
Uh, that looks good to me. I mean, this looks good.
translation.zh:
我感觉这没事
看起来还挺好的

translation.en: What in the hell?
You didn't scoop yours out, did you?
translation.zh:
你没有把你的眼球挖出来
对吧？

translation.en: What was the question again?
What?
Did any of you really do it?
translation.zh: 你们有没有人真的挖了？

translation.en: Well, then whose eyes are in that jar?
translation.zh: 那罐子里的眼珠是谁的？

translation.en: Well, Babyface found some rocks, and, uh, painted them.
translation.zh:
好吧 婴儿脸找到一些石头
然后涂了涂

translation.en: Surprise?
[echoing] Hey, Tom, you wanna play a game
translation.zh: 嘿 汤姆 你想玩个游戏吗

translation.en: to make up for all the father-son time we missed?
translation.zh:
用来弥补
我们错过的亲子时间？

translation.en: Peek-a-boo.
[Frank] Hey, come over here!
No, come over there!
You could have had everything, son.
translation.zh: 你本来可以拥有一切的 儿子

translation.en: But you had to do the right thing.
translation.zh: 但是你得做出正确的事

translation.en: Let me leave you with a bit of fatherly advice.
translation.zh: 让我给你一些父亲的建议吧

translation.en: -Never bring a knife to a gunfight. -[gun cocking]
[Tommy] One day, there will be too many, my love.
translation.zh: 有一天会有太多的人 亲爱的

translation.en: [Smoking Fox] But not today.
That was some mystical shit.
translation.zh: 这可真是些神秘的鬼东西

translation.en: Tommy.
You knew Cicero killed my mother.
translation.zh: 你知道西塞罗杀了我的母亲

translation.en: No!
No, I didn't know that.
No more lies!
Yeah, I knew. I knew.
Your mother insisted on telling.
She was going to rat the whole gang out, and I tried to convince her--
translation.zh:
她要出卖整个帮派
我试图去劝说她过…

translation.en: Tommy, look, I'm your father, for God's sake.
translation.zh:
汤米 我是你的父亲
看在上帝的面子上

translation.en: You don't kill your father, Tommy.
translation.zh: 你不能杀你的父亲 汤米

translation.en: His name is White Knife.
I ain't gonna kill you.
'Cause my true father taught me otherwise.
translation.zh:
因为我真正的父亲
不是这样教我的

translation.en: You can't leave me like this!
Tommy!
You can't leave me here alone!
translation.zh: 你不能把我自己留在这！

translation.en: [Lil Pete] Dear Mama, so much has changed since my last letter.
translation.zh:
亲爱的妈妈
自从我的上一封信改变良多

translation.en: I scarcely know where to begin.
translation.zh: 我都不知道该从哪开始了

translation.en: First off, it turns out our daddy is a bad, bad man,
translation.zh:
首先 原来我们的爸爸
是一个非常非常坏的人

translation.en: and he got thrown in jail.
But it's okay, 'cause Screaming Eagle, the Indian chief who raised Tommy,
translation.zh:
不过这没事 因为啸鹰
养大汤米的印第安酋长说

translation.en: said he'd be all our dads, too.
translation.zh: 他也会做我们所有人的爸爸

translation.en: I really like it here in this village.
translation.zh: 我真的很喜欢这个村庄

translation.en: Our new brothers and sisters love to have fun
translation.zh: 我们新的兄弟姐妹享受生活

translation.en: and have been so nice to all of us.
translation.zh: 对我们所有的人都很好

translation.en: These white guys cannot dance.
[Lil Pete] Danny don't drink whiskey no more.
translation.zh: 丹尼再也不喝威士忌了

translation.en: -No. -[man] Yee-haw!
[Lil Pete] And Ramon and Herm are trying to learn Indian ways.
translation.zh:
而哈蒙和赫姆
正试着融入印第安的生活

translation.en: [Lil Pete] Oh, and big news...
I finally have a girlfriend,
and she's much prettier than a canty-loupe.
Come on, you two! You're missing all the fun.
translation.zh:
过来啊 你们俩！
你们错过所有有趣的东西了

translation.en: Anyways, Mama, thanks for raising me.
translation.zh:
无论如何 妈妈
谢谢你养大我

translation.en: Your loving son, Lil Pete,
translation.zh: 爱你的儿子 小皮特

translation.en: proud member of the Ridiculous 6.
[Abner] Before you go...
Two, four, six, eight.
Who do we appreciate?
The Stockburns! The Stockburns!
Yeah! The Stockburns!
